breathing.text:
as you enter
a ritual

to send a name
into the
orbital temple
in space

take
a breath

nameInput.title: type a name
nameInput.subtitle: it will rise to the Orbital Temple in space.

emailInput.title: type your email
emailInput.subtitle: so you get a message when the name ascends.

success.text:
The name
{{name}}
is now queued
for ascension.

When the
temple in space
aligns, with
our antenna
on Earth

we will send
the name
and you'll receive
a message.
